title: Why MVC is so important
post: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the 'model' layer for daya, the 'view' layer for design and the 'controller' layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs. Authorisation
post: There is a difference between authentication and authorisation.  Authentication means confirming your own identity, whereas authorisation means being allowed access to the system.

title: Object-Relation Mapping (ORM)
post: I have really loved learning about ORM's.  It's really simplified the way I create queries in SQL.
